_header: For the beginning of wisdom is

BLHar3810.First Lines: ffor þe begynnyg of wysdom isfor to drede goddys rhȝtwysnes…
BLHar3810.Last Lines: …Thinke on þe ende or þu begyn& þou schalt neuer be þral to syn
BLHar3810.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
